channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Airflow Hive Provider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Airflow Hive Provider

item.title: CVE-2023-28706|2023-06-12T14:15:45.838Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20airflow%20hive%20provider
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Airflow Hive Provider.This issue affects Apache Airflow Hive Provider: before 6.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-25696|2023-02-24T11:48:21.189Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20airflow%20hive%20provider
item.description:
Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the Apache Airflow Hive Provider.
This issue affects Apache Airflow Hive Provider versions before 5.1.3.
